Product Name:: Creative Zen Hybrid - Wireless Over-Ear Headphones with Hybrid ANC, Ambient Mode, Up to 27 Hours (ANC On), Bluetooth 5.0
Description::
Find your Zen with Creative Zen Hybrid ANC Headphones 
 WIRELESS OVER-EAR HEADPHONES WITH HYBRID ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION AND AMBIENT MODE  Find your gateway to serenity and personal privacy with the Creative Zen Hybrid! 
 Featuring Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation for a more peaceful time and Ambient Mode when you need to be aware of your surroundings, get your much needed reprieve as and when you need them. 
 This pair of over-ear headphones is the perfect combination of versatility and performance--wireless or wired, outdoors or indoors--and is fitted a noise-cancelling microphone that can handle any impromptu calls. To top it off, its long-lasting battery life of up to 27 hours even with ANC enabled also means you can power through an entire day without distractions. 
 With Creative Zen Hybrid, you can always find your zen. 
 
 NOISE CONTROL  Activate Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) to cancel up to 95% of ambient noise in your surroundings, or switch to Ambient Mode with a push of the same button.  
 
 BATTERY  Recharge your headphones via USB-C and get up to 37 hours of battery life with ANC off; up to 27 hours with ANC on. A quick 5-minute charge also provides 5 hours of listening.  
 
 CONNECTIVITY  Bluetooth 5.0 — Hear smoother and uninterrupted audio wirelessly with Bluetooth 5.0 technology while out and about. If your devices support the AAC codec, you can enjoy improved wireless streaming and audio quality. 
 3.5 mm AUX-in — When the power on the headphones is running low or when you just want a quick and simple way to relax, plug in the headphones with the included AUX-in cable, and chill with your tunes. 
 
 AUDIO  At the heart of Creative Zen Hybrid are the drivers. Custom-tuned by our very own acoustic engineers, the dual 40 mm full-range Neodymium drivers promise high-quality sound without any fuss. 
 
 COMMUNICATIONS - GET HEARD CLEARLY  Sound clearer to others on the line for an improved call experience! The Creative Zen Hybrid features a noise-cancelling microphone that works to pick up your voice over the noise. Combined with ANC on, you’ll be able to hear them better when your environment’s noises are cancelled out--just press a button to activate it. 
 
 CONTROLS ARE RIGHT THERE  All the necessary controls are located on the right earcup so they are easy to access. Answer a call, make a quick command via smart assistants* like Siri or Google Assistant, or adjust your playback volumes, it’s all right there. 
 *This feature requires a Bluetooth connection to your iOS or Android phone with an internet connection, and support for the smart assistants. 
 DESIGN AND BUILD QUALITY  Luxurious Finish — This steel inner core is sheathed in premium synthetic leather that exudes a luxurious finish while staying versatile enough to match your setup and outfit. 
 Plush and Comfortable — On each side of the headphones are the 90° swivel earcups, built with extra plush synthetic leatherette for a comfortable and snug fit during extended listening hours without hurting them. 
 Adjustable Headband — Features a reinforced steel inner core that provides a backbone for the headphones to get a firm grip on your head for optimal acoustic seal and fit for different head shapes and sizes. 
 
 MADE FOR TRAVEL  The Creative Zen Hybrid can be folded in three ways so you can stow them away in your laptop carrying case or your hand carry on the plane.
